sources.title: Gypsy Life (1945)
sources.description: A Gypsy caravan travels across the countrieside. One night, as the Gypsy princess performs a dance, a bat-cat spies on the camp, flies back to his cave, and informs his colony, or whatever you call a group of bats. Anyway, they fly out, invade the camp and capture the Gypsies. The princess calls Mighty Mouse, who defeats the bats and wins the princess's heart. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/gypsy-life-1945/

metadata.Plot: A Mighty Mouse cartoon which sees Mighty Mouse protect a group of gypsy travelling mice from a colony of bats.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
